name: The Whip Sound App
description:
It's Sheldon's favorite, now it can be yours! Get over 18 awesome whip sounds to play with your friends. Does your friend's girl tell him what to do? Whip him..WH_TSH! Does your friend not hang out with you anymore because of his new girlfriend? WH_TSH! The whip sound apps were made famous by the Big Bang Theory. Now is your chance to own the best whip app in the AppStore!

BONUS: Included are over 50 other sound buttons that cover everything from a baby crying to bazookas.

Enjoy high quality and loud sound buttons with excellent graphics for each button. Enjoy!
